jd: From: Awkash Kumar, Largeton INC awkash@largeton.us Reply to: awkash@largeton.us JD ::Responsible for business analysis, troubleshooting and resolution of requests and incidents while adhering to departmental procedures.Responsible for data analysis and provide insights on the data to the customers.Communicate directly with customers, provide needed information and details on the assigned tasks.Use issue and request management application to record, track progress and milestones.Collaborate with the various teams (i.e., business, development and QA) to ensure that tasks are handled and brought to closure in an efficient and timely manner.Gains an in-depth understanding of application functionality and the business processes supported by these applications.Understand and meet the customer and senior management expectation on the delivery of the assigned tasks and keep them updated.Provides knowledge transition and training on supported applications to other team members when needed.Conduct business in a professional and ethical manner to reinforce goodwill and profitability for the company.10+ years' experience in business analysis, application support, system analysis with an understanding of software development lifecycle.Ability to exercise judgment using procedures and practices to determine the appropriate course of action and possess creative problem-solving skills.Successful candidate must have high level of interpersonal skills to communicate effectively with customers and internal IT team members.Clear and concise documentation skills.Excellent organizational, communication, comprehension, follow through, and documentation skills are required.Willingness to learn and adapt to new skills/technology.Assume initiative and ownership of tasks assigned.Focus on providing exceptional customer service.Successful candidate must work well in a group, as well as alone and unsupervised.Good time management skills are required to keep up with a tasks and requests from customers.Basic SQL querying/scripting a plus
